in Google expressions of corporate

It starts with a small group of Googlers

So in other words, it almost always

and organized by three employees before
it became official because it just

What does that mean? There are three
components of compassion. There is the
effective component which is I feel for

which is I understand you. And there is
a motivational component which is I want
to help you.
So what has this got to do with business

of leader to bring a company from
goodness to greatness
and he calls them level five leaders.
These are leaders who in in addition to
being highly capable possess two
important qualities and they are
humility and ambition.
These are leaders who are highly
ambitious for the greater good and
because they are ambitious for greater

we find that the cognitive and effective

So, search inside yourself, how does it
work? It works in three steps. The first
step is attention training. Attention
is the basis of all higher cognitive and
emotional abilities.
Therefore, any curriculum for training
emotional intelligence has to begin with
attention training. The idea here is to
train attention to create a quality of
mind that is calm and clear at the same
time. And this creates the foundation
for emotional intelligence.
The second steps follows the first step.
The second step is developing
self-nowledge and selfmastery.
So using the supercharged attention from

It means being able to observe our

and the process of emotion with high

And once you can do that, you create the
kind of self-nowledge that enables

The third step following the second step
is to create new mental habits.
What does that mean? Imagine this.
Imagine whenever you meet any other
